other_tests.findings: A novel mutation (H132P) in exon 4 of the SDHB gene was identified, absent in 160 control chromosomes.
There was a loss of one SDHB allele in the tumors of patients II.4 and II.8.
Confirmed exclusive expression of the mutated allele in both tumors of patients II.4 and II.8.

other_tests.date: Age 25 and age 42 for patient II.8
other_tests.findings: Elevated norepinephrine during hypertensive attacks at age 25; normalized post-surgery; elevated again at age 42 consistent with recurrent PGL.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Postoperatively normalized but later elevated again, indicating recurrence.

other_tests.findings: Increased uptake in the proximal right femur and frontal skull.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Progressed clinically and biochemically one year later.
